Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: S. Diphillipo "SobahMummy"
Reviews.Content: Was looking to trade up from my old big clunker of a tube TV to a new streamlined flat screen, and after all the investigating (there were hours of it) I decided on this Westinghouse 40'. It was the cheapest in it's category, and out of all the stores and web sites I tried. The only other place who had it for $299.00 was Best Buy, but on Amazon I got to save myself the $20.00 in tax ( I live in Taxachussetts). I have had it for over a month now with no issues so far. There were a lot of reviews that mentioned issues with the volume, I have no problem with my volume not being loud or good enough. With all that said, I would recommend this as a good TV to invest in at a very cheap price. Not top of the line, but has everything that the top of the line televisions do. Good luck in your choice.

Reviews.Title: happyshopper
Reviews.Author: robert cornfield
Reviews.Content: Great TV right out of the box. Nice screen and perfect size for media presentation at work. Would recommend to anyone looking for a reasonably priced HDTV

Reviews.Title: Trash
Reviews.Author: Keaton Garner
Reviews.Content: it only lasted 6 months then stopped working one day all of a sudden. not worth any bodys money. Seriously

Reviews.Title: Great TV for my office.
Reviews.Author: Chrisanne
Reviews.Content: This seems to be very good.  Good picture and the price was great.  Had an LG and it only lasted less than 4 years.

Reviews.Title: Yuk
Reviews.Author: g.eskine
Reviews.Content: When I got the tv it didn't work so I sent it back to get another one and it was no longer available

Reviews.Title: Never worked properly from day #1
Reviews.Author: Neil P. Littlefield "littleneil"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from someone other than Amazon. The TV arrived with a non working IR sensor out of the box. Neither my "cable company" remote or the "new TV's remote" would turn the TV on/off or adjust the volume - something my cable technician said was a bad IR sensor - for sure. The box states you are supposed to contact the manufacturer, not the reseller - and I did. On a Saturday - no technicians were available. On Monday, Westinghouse's  customer service representatives insisted that I try a new TV remote - which would arrive in 5-7 business days by regular mail. No surprize - when it arrived it didn't work either. So Westinghouse wanted me to box up the TV and send it back for a replacement (5-7 more days) and they would send me a replacement TV (another 5-7 more days).  Fortunately the reseller took pitty on me and accepted the return of the TV. The good news to report is that I thought the the TV was a good buy and the HD picture was pretty good.  The knock is on the manufacturer and how they handle customer problems. There will be no Westinghouse products in my home any time soon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: No need to reply back
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my parents as a gratitude give for have such nice parents. The have a small den. Works perfect for them. They love it.Buy it. You'll love it.

Reviews.Title: WOW - Great TV and monitor
Reviews.Author: Edith L. Taylor "E. Taylor"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best values on Amazon.  It looks great, good sound and the picture is fantastic,  All the hook up options make it perfect for Kindle, I pad, or Laptop.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Very good for shop tv
Reviews.Author: Rosalie J. Horath
Reviews.Content: Was looking for an inexpensive shop tv for my husband.  This served the purpose very well with no problems or issues.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR GREAT
Reviews.Author: Angelo Derossi
Reviews.Content: WELL WORTH THE PRICE ,,, GREAT PICTURE REALLY A GREAT THING ,,, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT JUST AS GOOD AS ANY OTHER

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Dan Vaughan
Reviews.Content: The sound seems to come from a tunnel or soup can. Poor Sound quality for this TV. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: So far it has been a great deal
Reviews.Author: irina holmes
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert on large-screen TVs in general, but this one has performed very well so far. I  was lured by the low price, and although the specs looked excellent, I suspected a less than stellar performance. I yet have to see how it is going to work with  wireless Roku and I am keeping my fingers crossed.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Carrel J. Brown "Senebamen"
Reviews.Content: Need to add a surround system and have hd cable box to reap full benefits but looks amazing with blu ray and gaming.

Reviews.Title: smh
Reviews.Author: me me
Reviews.Content: U have to have a damn password to hook up cable n s*** other then that I love my t.v now who going to give me code lol

Reviews.Title: Very Unhappy Customer
Reviews.Author: Zenny
Reviews.Content: Another defective product remote don't work with the unit. the picture was so bad it was only about a 20" picture in the middle of the 40" screen. I don't think anyone had inspected it before reselling it. I will not buy used TV again at AmazonI have purchased a 93" TV at Amazon and was very happy with it.
